data.title: Telescope Film
data.meta_description: Mike Leigh's 1983 production of Meantime. A portrait of working-class life in Thatcher's Britain.
data.text:
United Kingdom · 1983

1h 47m

Director Mike Leigh

Starring Phil Daniels, Tim Roth, Jeffrey Robert, Pam Ferris

Genre Comedy, Drama, TV Movie

​

Add to Watchlist

Please login to add films to your watchlist.

In this realistic, understated, and subtly funny drama, a working-class London family living in the East End struggles amid recession and hopelessness in the 1980s. Insightfully showing the day-to-day reality of the British working class, this film shines a light on the impacts of limited opportunity on one family's hopes, fears, and relationships.

Telescope Film

Telescope Film promotes international film and TV to American audiences. American audiences now have unprecedented access to film and TV from around the world. At Telescope Film, our mission is to connect that content with the people who want to watch it — and to help that audience grow.
